column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Back to the experience
column2: our journey started with a quick 30 minute wait (worth it)
column3: we were seated and the waiter proceeded to take the rest of our order. To make our mothers proud
column4: we ordered a Caesar salad for some veggies. It was pretty good. Not the best and far from the worst. I'd say 8.1-8.3 on a 10 scale.
